T02D2803:162a-0: @162a * // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po grags pa'i rgyal mtshan can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2803:162a-1: 'dir 'jig rten pa mang po chos dang ldan pa'i don bya ba la sbyar ba'i phyir /
T02D2803:162a-2: re zhig dam tshig can yon tan tshul na gnas
T02D2803:162a-3: pa'i che ba bsgrags pas gnas gang du skye bo
T02D2803:162a-4: 'du ba'am / mang pos mthong ba dang thos pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa zhig bcos la /
T02D2803:162a-5: rdo rje thab sbyor la sogs pas bgegs bsal zhing
T02D2803:162a-6: der khang bu brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis
T02D2803:162a-7: pa grong khyer pa dang pho brang pa man ngag
T02D2803:162a-8: dang ldan pas brtsig cing bri bar bya'o //
T02D2803:162a-9: de'i khor yug la sogs par mchod pa thams cad kyis brgyan cing /
T02D2803:162a-10: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa klog pas phyogs bzhir sgra sgrogs par byas la /
T02D2803:162a-11: rnal 'byor can bdag dang skal pa lhag pa dang
T02D2803:162a-12: mnyam pa thams cad la rnam pa thams cad gus
T02D2803:162a-13: pa'i ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa dang
T02D2803:162a-14: / skal pa dman pa rnams la snying rje'i lcags
T02D2803:162a-15: kyus zin pas ji tsam don bya bar bzod pa
T02D2803:162b-0: @162b gang phyir grags pa ma yin rgyun //
T02D2803:162b-1: mi snyan brjod sogs don min phyir //
T02D2803:162b-2: mkhas pa grags pa bzang skyong 'dod //
T02D2803:162b-3: des ni sdig pa bsal phyir 'bad //
T02D2803:162b-4: gdug pa'i dag gi mtshon rnon pos //
T02D2803:162b-5: gzhan gyi grags pa gcod byed cing //
T02D2803:162b-6: tshe rabs kun tu bdag gi yang //
T02D2803:162b-7: snyan pa ma yin kun skyed pa'o //
T02D2803:162b-8: mi gang bdag nyid skyon brjod kyi //
T02D2803:162b-9: gzhan gyi yon tan mi 'phyar la //
T02D2803:162b-10: nam yang nyes par smra mi byed //
T02D2803:162b-11: de ni grags pa bzang ldan 'gyur //
T02D2803:162b-12: ston pa la sogs gud ston byed //
T02D2803:162b-13: pha rol grags pa ngan sel brtson //
T02D2803:162b-14: bdag nyid sdig pa spong la mkhas //
T02D2803:162b-15: grags pa'i rgyal mtshan cho ga bzhi //
T02D2803:162b-16: sdig pa nyung du dang bsod nams mang po can ni 'phags pa dgyes pa'i gang zag ste /
T02D2803:162b-17: grags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi tshogs snyan pa mang po rnyed par rung ngo //
T02D2803:162b-18: des nam du yang khong khro bas gzhan spyo bar mi bya'o //
T02D2803:162b-19: slob ma log par zhugs pa la sogs pa 'khrug
T02D2803:162b-20: pas mi snyan par brjod pas slar bzlog pa ni
T02D2803:162b-21: ma yin / dkyil 'khor bris nas rtsod pa can gyi skyes bu bsten par mi bya'o //
T02D2803:162b-22: rtag tu byams pas non pa'i yid //
T02D2803:162b-24: kha na ma tho med kun spyod //
T02D2803:162b-25: rnam zhi la grags pa 'grub ste //
T02D2803:162b-26: de la 'dir rtsa ba'i rig pa sngon du bsnyen
T02D2803:162b-27: pas dbang gyur pa thob par byas nas grong khyer
T02D2803:162b-28: ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rang nyid ci tsam du grags
T02D2803:162b-29: pa bsgrags par 'dod pa de tsam nye bar dgod
T02D2803:162b-30: do // pho brang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo'i
T02D2803:162b-31: rtsibs brgyad pa padma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa
T02D2803:162b-32: sprin gyi phung po'i rum phrag na gnas pa rgyun
T02D2803:162b-33: ma chad par 'brug gi sgra zab mo sgrogs pas
T02D2803:162b-34: do // mdzes pa'o // grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dbus bzhugs la //
T02D2803:162b-35: sgra ldan brgyad kyis dud 'bud bskor //
T02D2803:162b-36: phyogs gzugs mtshams ni phyed gzugs mdog /'dab brgyad la gnas las sgrub brtson //
T02D2803:162b-37: de bzhin rtsibs rim dga' ba dang //
T02D2803:162b-38: mi phab dbyangs bzang nga ro che //
T02D2803:162b-39: snyan pa'i tog dang kun khyab byed //
T02D2803:162b-40: yid gzhungs don bsgrub ces bya brgyad //
T02D2803:162b-41: dkar dang dmar ser ljang dang dmar //
T02D2803:162b-42: dkar dang ljang dang sar bas te //
T02D2803:162b-43: lha yi rnga chen brdung ba dang //
T02D2803:162b-44: sgrub pa po yi bsngags pa brjod //
T02D2803:162b-45: g-yer kha la sogs snyan pa'i sgras //
T02D2803:162b-46: grong khyer la ni sems byed cing //
T02D2803:162b-47: pho brang lhan cig 'brug sgra yis //
T02D2803:162b-48: ma lus grags pa sgrogs par byed//
T02D2803:163a-0: @163a * // de ltar dkyil 'khor sa bskyed nas /
T02D2803:163a-1: bdag gi smin mtshams kyi hr'i: las 'od phyung bas
T02D2803:163a-2: po ta la nas grags pa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
T02D2803:163a-3: te / de nyid bzhugs pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2803:163a-4: de nas phrin las la sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir sngags bzla bar bya ste /
T02D2803:163a-5: aom a'a:hr'i:sarba lo ka ma ma k'irti spha ra spha ra /
T02D2803:163a-7: pra k'a sa pra k'a sa sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2803:163a-8: ji srid dal bar ma gyur par //
T02D2803:163a-9: dkyil 'khor rjes mthun don grub byed //
T02D2803:163a-11: mchod pas mnyes byas gshegs su gsol //
